name: Engarde
description:
In Engarde, you play as a swordfish swimming to the bottom of the ocean, fending off predators and sea creatures with your sword-nose thing.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 48. The theme was "Deeper and Deeper."

WASD to move | Mouse to aim | Left Click to attack

Music from OpenGameArt.org
"Underwater Theme" - CleytonKauffman
"Final/Boss Battle #1" - nene
